pages.text: Rottweilers were originally bred as herding and driving dogs, though also for protection.$(br2)Standing at roughly a block tall, these sturdy dogs come in three different coats.
These dogs are most commonly found in badlands biomes. They can also be found in deserts and savannas, and more rarely around savanna plateaus.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Bacon Treat.
